message.body: that office is kind of in a weird place--there's a small little collection of office buildings behind the lansdale train station
and that is where this office is
yeah I might go just to go
who knows...maybe they offer you a million dollars
dude how sick was that alley oop to himself
one of the better ingame dunks I have seen
he is one of the best in the box safetys
and Grant is a top 10 FS playing the deep zone
so it allows him to play FS and Phillips to move to SS kicking out russell who sucks ass
and he brings in familiarity with the tampa 2 which we are moving towards
yeah i think we are moving towards that
our new DC is Bucs LB coach
of course Mora is our actual DC but he is the marrone to sean peyton
so that email is totally fake
but i think it's pretty good
i need to create a link
i can just say to will that it is getting so many hits
that is how they do links
i pretty much copied everything up until that point
how can we get joey next?
I am getting pretty pumped with the Seahawks offseason
you guys are doing a solid job
he is not a great player
yeah DLine is all about depth
right now I'd put the 3 winners as the Chiefs, Giants, and Seahawks probably
Chiefs are big-time winners in my mind
but he is big and will allow Mebane to focus on being a 3 tech and disrupt shit
a couple of sites had Mebane as being the most underrated defensive player inteh NFL last year
still a little worried about Oline
we need to get Phillips - will just solidify our secondary
move Grant to his natural position which will go from one of the worst FS in russell to a top 10 FS in Grant
are you excited about Ms Andrews?
he allows us to focus on one tackle in the draft
and hopefully he can get his brother off the depression wagon
KLife just locked up the #3 OBX pick for you guys
we are usually good at that
but we each thought the other did it
hey--i had a panic the other day
did i ever pay you for the homecoming hotel? I was looking through checks and I couldn't find one...
but it's so long ago i can't remember
yeah i have absolutely no clue
only reason i even thought about it was cause I was looking at this old rent check issue
have they jacked up your rent at all?
so we are in the 2nd year
then need to decide to stay in apt and the city
have you guys talked about it much?
we looked at house last weekend
we are thinking more and more about it
erin wants to have a house by the time we are 30 if we are going to start a fmily
my suggestion is start the process early
cause you don't want to settle
in all actuallity it took Kristen and I 6 months
you know the first 4 were kind of like what you guys are doing
and if we would have not kept waiting we would have settled
which would have been a mistake big one
where did you guys look at a house? do you have a website?
I am really good at secrets
(i usually forget about 10 minutes after people tell me)
we looked at a house in Nyack
the 2nd bathroom was in teh basement and horrifying
we have to keep it going
Rockland county is SO much cheaper
even though we'd prefer to be in Westchester because of the train
yeah...but it is right on top of the highway
like you can hear the cars going by
me: you see that link from Greg Sent at 2:59 PM on Wednesday Will: yeah but it doesnt work for me it goes to a dead page Sent at 3:00 PM on Wednesday me: yeah it is going dead for me too now

Will: i cant believe that story is true becuase Snyder has so many other forms of making money and i was under the impression that before he bought 6 Flags he was completely liquid me: I have no clue I do know this shit is for real and a lot of peeps losing their shirts
we need to somehow create a working link
and that girl is supposedly loaded
and we are stuck with our "poor" wives
imagine how great life would be
how about i pay for your golf when we play
since i can't remember paying for the homecoming house?
I think the Hawks may take stafford or sanchez
your team, much like the Eagles
so why not go for a Crab, Raji, Curry
but no draft pick will really contribute this year
we already have 3 big contracts at LB
Crab - WR have big learning curve so most likely his impact will be felt in a couple years
D Jack did well last year
Raji just dont see that with signing of big run stuffer moving Mebane to playmaker
he did do well - but you cannot disagree with the fact that WRs generally do not impact a lot their rookie year
fitz was not an impact until his 3rd yr prob and really this year
Fitz had a very solid rookie year though
I still am thinking QB today
how often do you get a chance to take a top QB?
also we have an excellent opp to groom a back up
good QB entering the last couple years at best
bad back so that is rolling the dice big time
except for the win now timeline with Hasselbeck at QB
you have a solid backup in Wallace
long term, i think i like Sanchez
Wallace is not the future at QB
we are not a superbowl contending team with him at QB
but i mean as a QB for today
and taking someone like Stephen McGee
Ill stick with Wallace at that point
don't believe in either of those guys
wallace is a great backup - he will keep you afloat and can win games on a solid team with no holes around him
I think Freeman is no good
I think both would be succesful to be as good as wallace - and wallace is by no means great
to be honest I don't like either
would you be pissed if they took a QB?
probably be paid more than Hasselbeck
i have no problem with that
I would not be pissed because I trust their evaluation
if they really believe in it then it is kind of exciting to know we have the future at QB
but much better than Kolb in the wings
I mean I am more nervous about Hass
I mean we are basically rolling the dice with a bad backd QB
thats looking more and more like counting on D Branch playing a whole season
i think that's more risky than Hasselbeck
but he looked amazing the last 3 games of the season
so that makes me somewhat optimistic
i was wondering the teams it was against
I would be elated if I got those two
i don't know much about Britton though
he seems to be moving up boards
peeps say he should've stayed another year
yeah I heard him interviewed and was impressed
he looked solid at the combine
man I can't wait for the draft
I am almost more excited about our 2nd rounder
we have 3 picks in the top 60
jsut cause there will be so many possibilities and that is a position that can play right away

IF BRIAN CUSHING IS THE BEST LINEBACKER IN THE DRAFT, WHY CAN’T I FIND HIM ON THIRD DOWN?
This bothers me considerably, and so far, all the tape I’ve watched on Cushing makes me wonder what his role will be on third down in the NFL. I’ll keep searching for an answer, but I’m getting frustrated. The best linebacker in the draft? Really?
Rey maualkajsdfjasidagoiasginasg will be sick if he goes to SD
i compare him to younger Trotter
when he was making Pro Bowls
not a coverage guy--but a great downhill LB
needs to mature and play smarter
peeps said same thing about Jake Long
he had a solid year at LT
eagles should trade for Raiders RB
i do think the Eagles will be more inclined to use both 1st rounders
unless they are getting an NFL ready guy
like unless they are moving up
or getting a player from the roster in return
i don't see them moving down
because they have too many holes
and this draft should replenish their offensive talent
since their D is young and upcoming
they need to get younger at RB and OL
